a0.speaker: Jane:
a0.dialogue: I'm not done with you yet! Saying that I have a bar of soap in my mouth... this is unacceptable!

a1.speaker: Marisa:
a1.dialogue: Who cares? I have one of your pictures. You are definitely an agent of that Soap God.

a2.speaker: Marisa:
a2.dialogue: You better stay inside a bubble rather than going around that tone-deaf idiot.
